channel.title: Question
channel.description: Will mage ever be introduced and how do i switch my mage from normal 2 achients with out doing quest on a LAN server?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Sells Sells
item.description:
@Sells wrote:

there will be ancients magic+emotes in the whitescape v3.3
find this at www.whitescape.net

if its your own server:
uhm i did it i foud tuts at runestatus but its easy get in your client.java then find the sidebars
than you will see questmenu attackmenu ect there does stand magic tab and rightbehind it there does stand ancent magic with a code
use that code at the open sidebar left to friend list

Read full topic
